title: Newsleecher v3.9 beta 17 + crack.rar
description:
NewsLeecher v3.9 beta 17 crack
---------------------

--- Installation ---

1. Install Newsleecher v3.9 beta 17 using the provided installer.
1. Copy all files in map &#039;crack&#039; to the folder where you installed NewsLeecher (default "c:Program FilesNewsLeecher").
2. Go to the NewsLeecher folder and run "patch.cmd"
3. When patch completes verify that you have a file "newsleecher.exe" and a file "newsleecher.exe~"
4. Use "hosts.bat" in map &#039;hosts&#039; to set the addresses below for blocking Newsleecher calling home.

127.255.255.255 newsleecher.com
127.255.255.255 www.newsleecher.com
127.0.0.1       www.newsleecher.com/!tools/
127.0.0.1       www.newsleecher.com
127.0.0.1       www.newsleecher.com/
127.0.0.1       newsleecher.com
127.0.0.1       newsleecher.com/
72.55.172.157 secure.newsleecher.com

5. Now you can safely start NewsLeecher and use it.
